attributes.action: Alcohol & Tobacco is worse than Cannabis
attributes.additional_details:
With thousands each week, people are entering hospitals due to alcohol and tobacco related issues be it violence or just being over all sick. There is hardly any issues of cannabis users consuming the hospital enviroment and hardly costing the NHS any further spending. By legalizing cannabis use you are:

Curing dieases
Cut the spending budget of the NHS by more than half
Making a more peaceful enviroment
And over all lightening the burden of tax payers

Cannabis is also a billion dollar crop and  was used all over the world from fabrics, paper, money, food and medicine.

So if you want to become really wealthy...Then legalize cannabis for all!

You can't rely on the street dealers as they can mix other drugs with the pure cannabis leaf.
